name: grem
description:
grem is a short challenging tile-based action puzzle game about traveling deeper and deeper into castle depths and lighting your way through the dark

Arrow keys to move, SPACE or Z to pick up and throw items, and R to restart the level.

Built with HaxeFlixel, Aseprite and Ableton Live.

Lighting from Pennie Quinn's Lighting tutorial

font from Bartek Nowak
